snippet: New York Giants running back Rashad Jennings and cornerback Eli Apple are inactive for the game on Monday night against the Minnesota Vikings.

headline.main: Jennings, Apple Inactive for Giants Against Vikings
headline.print_headline: Jennings, Apple Inactive for Giants Against Vikings

snippet: After more than 20 years in fashion, he has become the world’s friendly neighborhood designer and shopkeeper.

headline.main: Steven Alan’s Goals: Subtlety and Quality

snippet: Irish consumer sentiment edged slightly lower last month, a survey showed on Monday, the details of which hinted at an uptick in uncertainty and nervousness on the part of Irish consumers, according to its authors.

headline.main: Irish Consumer Sentiment Edges Lower in September
headline.print_headline: Irish Consumer Sentiment Edges Lower in September

snippet: Mobile phone maker FIH Mobile Ltd warned on Monday its consolidated net profit would more than halve this year as weaker sales dent business at the Hong Kong-listed unit of Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.

headline.main: Foxconn's FIH Mobile Warns of 52 Percent Drop in Net Profit in 2016
headline.print_headline: Foxconn's FIH Mobile Warns of 52 Percent Drop in Net Profit in 2016

snippet: Facebook is launching a "lite" version of it Messenger chat app. It is aimed at emerging markets, where many people use older phones that don't have enough room to store or ability to run the full-featured application due to slower internet speeds...

headline.main: Facebook Launches 'Lite' Version of Messenger Overseas
headline.print_headline: Facebook Launches 'Lite' Version of Messenger Overseas

snippet: Star designer Alber Elbaz, whose abrupt exit from Lanvin a year ago shocked the fashion world, is back in action, this time dressing women with perfume.

headline.main: Ex-Lanvin Designer Elbaz Turned Nose for Frederic Malle
headline.print_headline: Ex-Lanvin Designer Elbaz Turned Nose for Frederic Malle

snippet: Google is unveiling its answer to Echo, an artificially intelligent home device that vaulted Amazon ahead of Google in a race to build technology that interacts as humans do.
abstract: Google is expected to unveil Google Home, device similar to Amazon's Echo, that uses artificial intelligence to understand what users are saying and respond conversationally; device is expected to redeem Google's standing as leader in natural language processing after Amazon beat them in creating virtual assistant for home.

headline.main: Google, Lagging Amazon, Races Across the Threshold Into the Home
headline.print_headline: Behind Amazon, Google Races  Across Thresholds Into Homes

byline.original: By DAISUKE WAKABAYASHI and NICK WINGFIELD

snippet: Donald Trump's decision to take a $916 million loss on his 1995 income tax return showed his business acumen and "genius" at figuring out how to minimize his tax bill, two of the Republican presidential candidate's advisers said on Sunday.

headline.main: Trump's Tax Writeoff Shows His 'Genius' at Business, Advisers Say
headline.print_headline: Trump's Tax Writeoff Shows His 'Genius' at Business, Advisers Say

snippet: Physical records, like the ones offered by Scott Hansen, who performs electronic rock as Tycho, claim a big chunk of record sales in a digital age.
abstract: Musician Scott Hansen, who records under name Tycho, releases album Epoch online but offers custom turntable slipmat to fans who place advance orders for vinyl record; unique promotion shows lengths artists are making to take advantage of immediacy of digital format while satisfying growing demand for vinyl records.

headline.main: With Vinyl, the Musician Tycho Establishes a Physical Presence
headline.print_headline: With Vinyl, Creating a Physical Presence

snippet: The leak of some of Donald Trump's tax returns highlights enormous disparities in the tax code between high-income businesses and individuals and everyone else that may have allowed the Republican presidential nominee to avoid paying federal incom...

headline.main: System Disparity Evident in Trump Tax Return
headline.print_headline: System Disparity Evident in Trump Tax Return
